channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Forecasters Warn of ‘Wildfire Outbreak’ Across Texas and Oklahoma
item.description: Strong winds and dry conditions could help fuel fires in parts of the Southwest and the Plains on Friday.

item.title: Trump says a 200% tariff on European alcohol would be ‘great’ for American businesses but wine sellers say it will slam the whole industry—’including U.S. wineries’
item.description: Wine and spirits from the 27-nation European Union made up 17% of the total consumed in the U.S. in 2023.

item.title: Canada Gets a New Leader Amid Trump’s Trade War
item.description: Mark Carney, Canada’s incoming prime minister, is no stranger to crises. Now he faces what is arguably the challenge of a lifetime: President Trump. M...

item.title: Catholics Around the Globe Heed Francis’ Call to ‘Pray for Me’
item.description: The pope’s words emphasized his humility and belief that simple acts of devotion could unite the church. His illness has made the appeal more urgent t...

item.title: Publicis New York CEO Carla Serrano and the downside of Trump’s war against all
item.description: Also: Stocks enter a correction, Tesla complained about tariffs.

item.title: Trump to Deliver Speech to Justice Dept. After Triumph in Battles Against It

item.title: Why Is Gavin Newsom Seeking Common Ground With the Right?
item.description: Democrats are desperate for leaders who will fight on their behalf, not flatter their enemies.

item.title: China Condemns CK Hutchison-BlackRock Panama Canal Deal

item.title: Challenged by Trump, Trudeau Rallies Canada as He Leaves Office
item.description: After nearly a decade in power, Justin Trudeau steps down on Friday as prime minister amid a trade war and President Trump’s stated desire to annex Ca...

item.title: Kurdish Fighters Called a Truce, but Turkey Kept Up Lethal Strikes
item.description: Turkey is still bombing armed Kurdish insurgents in Iraq and Syria, even after their leader urged them to lay down their arms and disband, and their g...

item.title: DOGE’s frenetic rush to cancel government leases will hit dozens of federal offices by June and hundreds more over coming months: ‘It’s like a blitzkrieg’
item.description: Several agencies are facing 20 or more lease cancellations in all, including the IRS, the Social Security Administration, the U.S. Department of Agric...

item.title: How Mexico President Claudia Sheinbaum Won Trump’s Praise
item.description: A scientist and leftist with limited foreign policy experience, Claudia Sheinbaum seems to have connected with President Trump with her calm demeanor ...

item.title: Two Astronauts on an 8-Day Mission That Turned Into a 9-Month Odyssey
item.description: An exclusive interview with Suni Williams and Butch Wilmore, whose planned short mission to space turned into an adventure lasting much, much longer.

item.title: BMW expects to take €1 billion hit from growing tariff war
item.description: BMW and other European carmakers are bracing to see the full extent of Donald Trump’s planned tariffs on vehicles imported to the U.S.

item.title: Beijing criticizes CK Hutchison’s $23 billion Panama Canal deal by reposting commentary that slams it as ‘an act of submission’
item.description: CK Hutchison dropped by over 6% in Hong Kong trading on Friday, even as the city's benchmark Hang Seng Index rose by over 2%.
